entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
